description: This file defines a Redux Toolkit slice for authentication state management in a React application. It includes asynchronous thunks for login and logout actions that interact with an external API and dispatch UI notifications.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Async thunk for user login that calls authApi.login and dispatches success or error toast notifications.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Async thunk for user logout that calls authApi.logout and dispatches success or error toast notifications.

ctags.name: login
ctags.pattern: /^export const login = createAsyncThunk('auth\/login', async (payload, { rejectWithValue, dispatch/

ctags.name: logout
ctags.pattern: /^export const logout = createAsyncThunk('auth\/logout', async (_, { rejectWithValue, dispatch }) /
